entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
